features: COMBINATION TOASTER OVEN WITH AIR FRY - Get more done thanks to a combination toaster oven and air fryer with all the settings you need, including an air fry setting to quickly fry your favorites
CONVECTION MODE - Achieve golden results in your convection toaster oven thanks to an advanced cooking mode that circulates heat for a perfectly even bake
MANUAL CONTROLS - Toaster oven and air fryer control knobs allow you to manually adjust the settings to perfection
7 COOKING FUNCTIONS - Meet all your cooking needs in one multifunction toaster oven with 7 cooking modes: air fry, bake, toast, keep warm, broil, roast, and convection
ACCESSORY SET - Always have the right-sized cookware to fit your toaster oven thanks to an included accessory kit that includes a rack, baking pan, and air fryer accessories

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GE Mechanical Air Fry 7-in-1 Toaster Oven - G9OAABSSPSS This durable toaster oven features Air fry mode that quickly fries foods with less oil for a healthier, cleaner alternative to frying. Its cooking temperatures range from 180-450 degrees F. 7 cooking modes: air fry, bake, toast, broil, roast, defrost, proof and convection.Includes air fry accessories, easy-clean crumb tray and perfect-fit baking pan.Stainless steel finish matches most any kitchen décor.

Combination Toaster Oven with Air Fry Get more done thanks to a combination toaster oven and air fryer with all the settings you need, including an air fry setting to quickly fry your favorites. Manual Controls Toaster oven and air fryer control knobs allow you to manually adjust the settings to perfection. 7 Cooking Functions Meet all your cooking needs in one multifunction toaster oven with 7 cooking modes: air fry, bake, toast, keep warm, broil, roast, and convection. Accessory Set Always have the right-sized cookware to fit your toaster oven thanks to an included accessory kit that includes a rack, baking pan, and air fryer accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finding this GE Mechancial Option was a dream come true for my mid-century kitchen
reviews.reviewText: I have a mid-century house and have decorated my kitchen accordingly so a digital display oven/air fryer would have just ruined the look. I almost couldn't believe my eyes when I found this mechanical control GE unit.Another big problem that ruins so many modern appliances is wildly oversized, ugly logos, I'm thrilled with a tastefully sized classic GE "meatball" logo that enhances rather than detracts from the design. This unit looks perfect on top of vintage serving cart.Besides being beautiful and fitting into my decor, the oven works great too, temperatures are accurate and the timer is accurate. The mechanical option also comes into play with making the appliance blissfully easy to use too, just three knobs to set, the function (bake, toast, air fry, etc.), the desired temperature, and the time. No tedious menus to fumble through or learning curve whatsoever! And unlike many ovens like this, the toast function actually toasts things as fast as a toaster.I love this oven!UPDATE - A frequent complaint of air-fryers is the noise, but air fry function on this oven barely makes any noise. You do hear the whir of the fan when it's on, but it's low enough that you can easily carry on a conversation in normal tones, listen to music or TV. For comparison, my old B&D convection toaster oven was much noisier when baking than the GE is when air-frying! Impressive. When using other features you barely hear anything, just the gentle, barely audible ticking of the manual timer (which I like). GE really though of everything when designing this oven, it's a pleasure all around to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars timer knob revisited -- a remedy!
reviews.reviewText: and an update: did hear from GE but in the meantime I found an ever so easy fix and am happily baking, roasting, air frying, and toasting and warming.a replacement knob: ordered from Amazon: TJPoto Replacement Part Timer knob Air Fryer HF-919B D Type Shaft; within 2 minutes of its arrival my GE oven was operational without the handy pliers to set the timer.Oven is a delight to use and easy to clean. Price is reasonable. If the timer knob is your concern, there are universal replacement knobs out there evnn more inexpensive than the one I purchased.Loved this appliance for 3 months, when the timer knob came off and could not be reattached. The on and off function is controlled by the timer knob: if it does not work, the oven does not work. Even more distressing is that that GE did not respond to any email requests for assistance despite there being a warranty. I have ordered a universal toaster oven knob "d" style (as it is on this GE oven) and am guardedly hopeful.Nonetheless-- not even a "thank you for your email and we will be in touch soon" from GE. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The oven is good but could be better
reviews.reviewText: G E Digital Control toaster oven - So this was my first toaster oven purchase. The oven itself is good but after shopping around more there are better ovens for the same price range or a little more. This oven doesn’t have an interior light even though the picture looks like it does unless I missed it. I had to keep opening the door to check the food. The pans are not that sturdy and are small. I think the biggest draw back for me was not being able to add more time .. for example when I toasted frozen waffles and they weren’t completely done I had to wait for the oven to finish and cool then restart cooking. Another thing to consider if you are thinking of purchasing this oven is that if you need to return it you can only return it using UPS and there is a significant turnaround time for your refund back to your credit card. I started my return on December 26, 2023 they acknowledged that they received the oven December 29, 2023 but the credit will not be initiated to my card until between January 12th - January 21, 2024. I don’t understand why it’s takes that long to initiate the refund. Once the refund has been initiated there is another delay before the funds hit my card so I’m not at all happy about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this air fryer!! We use it almost every day. It's large enough to do a complete meal. The toast option is great . You can do 6 slices at a time!! Would buy this item again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s awesome. The tray at the bottom cleans surprisingly easily. You can always put parchment paper to catch drips but it’s not even worth the time because it cleans so easily. I brought it over to my mamas house during thanksgiving so we would have another oven available and it cooked better than her real oven.Only issue I’ve had with it is the timer knob fell off but I just put some super glue on it and haven’t had a problem with it since. My real oven’s knob has also fallen off and been replaced so maybe it’s user error...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product… this is my 2nd purchase of this product! It’s easy to use easy to clean.. Shipping was timely and as stated, packaging was as manufacturer packaged. My 1st purchase is still working fine .. I purchased for my 2nd kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I already got a replacement for this product because the knob broke and it was heating very unevenly after a few months. Now, after a few months of using the replacement they sent me (which required tons of back and forth to get), the timer doesn’t shut off, which is a major FIRE HAZARD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works okay but has flaws
reviews.reviewText: It's a solid unit but the control knobs are cheap plastic and can melt off. I've been able to re-secure them with JB Weld, but still. It shouldn't happen. I use it all the time for baking, and it works fine, although the temperature can be difficult to regulate. The convection function works well. It toasts fine but takes a long time. Haven't had good luck with Air fry. We prefer mechanical to digital, which is why be chose this one. We wouldn't order it again. Another brand with metal knobs might be better.
